programme.title: 48 Hours on ID
48 Hours on ID S16 E5 The Hollywood Ripper: Watch Full Episode Online
programme.desc: This is a two-hour, ten year, investigation of Michael Gargiulo, the serial killer known as The Hollywood Ripper; Gargiulo is accused of murdering three women and trying to kill another who lived to bear witness against him.

programme.title: 48 Hours on ID
48 Hours on ID S16 E6 The Hollywood Ripper on Trial: Watch Full Episode Online
programme.desc: examining the 10-year investigation of Michael Gargiulo, the serial killer known as The Hollywood Ripper; Gargiulo is accused of murdering three women and trying to kill another who lived to bear witness against him.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
The Perfect Murder S5 E6 Whidbey Island Mystery: Watch Full Episode Online
programme.desc: At Christmastime, Russel Douglas is found shot to death in his car on a deserted road on Whidbey Island north of Seattle; it's the start of a case that will take a decade to solve and leave many with lingering questions.

programme.title: Street Science (S1)
programme.desc: Kevin and his team of experts explore the strange science behind oobleck, a bizarre material that can behave as both a solid and a liquid.

programme.title: How To Build...Everything (S1)
programme.desc: In this episode: the simple, easy steps to build your very own Rocketship, Hovercraft, and MRI Scanner.

programme.title: How Do They Do It? (S9)
programme.desc: In this series, discover how the latex produced by the chicle tree is turned into chewing gum and how the complex engine of a Formula 1 Racing Car is assembled.

programme.title: How Do They Do It? (S9)
programme.desc: Vanilla may be a byword for plain and uninteresting, but the story of the spice that creates the world's favourite ice cream flavour is anything but bland.

programme.title: Super Factories: Food Edition
programme.desc: Special access to state-of-the-art factories reveals the secrets of how America's favorite foods are made.

programme.title: Unexplained And Unexplored (S1)
programme.desc: New evidence suggests the Maya civilization did not suddenly vanish, but instead, that they survived and resettled in the United States.

programme.title: Hunting Atlantis (S1)
programme.desc: Stel and Jess dig into unexplored archeological sites along the Adriatic coast of Croatia.

programme.desc: Deep in the Guatemalan jungle the Ancient Maya built an advanced civilization of towering pyramids, & a massive network of paved roads before they mysteriously vanished.
